prod_short_desc: Learn about daily routines with this easy-to-build set!
prod_long_desc:
Play and learn at LEGO® DUPLO® My First Playhouse! Combine the chunky pieces to build the playhouse as a perfect introduction to basic construction skills. The special decorated bricks showing key parts of the daily routine provide talking points for you and your toddler so you can teach them about their day. The turnable night/day brick helps set the scene for learning and role play. Start your stories with this easy-to-build set and help the 2 DUPLO figures get up in the morning, eat breakfast, brush their teeth, and have fun on the slide before lying them down in the beds to rest. The brightly colored DUPLO bricks are designed especially to be safe and suitable for little hands. Includes 2 child DUPLO figures.
Includes 2 child LEGO® DUPLO® figures
Features an easy-to-build playhouse with opening doors and window, and a fun slide
Includes a turnable day/night brick as a scene-setter and 4 brightly colored decorated bricks with key moments in the daily routine
An ideal introduction to early building skills
Teach your toddler about their day as they play out daily life at home
Create fun role play scenarios with the DUPLO figures
DUPLO products are specially designed tobe safe and suitable for little hands
Playhouse measures over 8" high, 7" wide and 3" long
Slide measures over 3" high, 1" wide and 5" long
